rules_text:
Whenever a time counter is removed from Farwalker Herd while it’s exiled, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Suspend 1–{2}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{W} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
